title: Sabbatini-ke no Renai Jijou
original_name: サバティーニ家の恋愛事情
sinopse:
In the Sabbatini-ke no Renai Jijou series:

1. Ai to Nikushimi no Aida (Scandal: Unclaimed Love-Child) [Hanyuu Shion]
2. Shiawase to Iu Na no Wana (Shock: One-Night Heir) [Sakura Haruhi]
3. Nozomarenu Tsuma (The Wedding Charade) [Sakurano Nayuna]
